query: ALTER TABLE static_site ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_pk PRIMARY KEY(id), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_chk_name_is_trimmed CHECK( name = TRIM(name) ), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_uq_id_workspace_id UNIQUE(id, workspace_id), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_fk_id_workspace_id FOREIGN KEY(id, workspace_id) REFERENCES resource(id, owner_id), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_fk_current_live_upload FOREIGN KEY(id, current_live_upload) REFERENCES static_site_upload_history(static_site_id, upload_id);
